scenes.background: [Alex] messages you about the urgent task. You decide to finish your leave and suggest someone else to handle it.
scenes.description: Monica frowns, crossing her arms. 'Why did you decide to leave it to someone else? We really needed your help.'

options.text: I understand it’s urgent, but I needed to prioritize my well-being. Can we discuss a backup plan for future situations?
options.analysis: You show good self-regulation and emotional perception by explaining your need to prioritize your leave, but empathy could be improved.

options.text: I’m sorry I couldn’t help this time. If you need any advice on handling the task, I can provide some guidance remotely.
options.analysis: You offer remote support, showing moderate empathy and social skills, but the motivation to directly handle the task is lower.

options.text: I see that this was important. Next time, please let me know earlier so I can plan better.
options.analysis: You acknowledge the importance of the task and suggest better communication for the future, showing good empathy but lower emotional perception.
